entry.data:
SUNNY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 20S
CALM WINDS

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
NOT AS COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 13
CALM WINDS

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 30S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S
LOWS AROUND 40

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S

PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF RAIN IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS AROUND 60
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF RAIN IN THE EVENING, THEN PARTLY CLOUDY AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
